name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Project Manager with 10+ years of experience driving change management and delivering high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance. Proven skills in **Project Management**, **Regulatory Compliance**, and **Clinical Trial Data Management**, ensuring adherence to compliance standards such as HIPAA and FHIR. Strong communication and interpersonal skills facilitate effective collaboration across teams, while exceptional leadership abilities enhance project delivery and stakeholder engagement. Technical aptitude includes hands-on expertise in modern technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and proficiency in full-stack development with frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, and adept in CI/CD automation and microservices architecture. Brings practical experience in developing MLOps pipelines and automating workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about leading projects that drive real-world impact and enhance operational efficiency.
